name: Melek Onen
content: Melek Önen Melek Önen Professor - Digital Security Department Voice: +33 (0)4 93 00 82 09 Fax: + 33(0)4 93 00 82 00 e-mail: melek(dot)onen(at)eurecom(dot)fr Home Biography Research projects Publications Advisorship, TPC Membership, etc. About me I am professor at EURECOM. My research interests lie in applied cryptography and privacy enhancing technologies, and recently in privacy-preserving and secure machine/federated learning.
